item.title: El anuncio de la nueva NES Mini te llevará a los 80
item.description:
El anuncio de la nueva NES Mini te llevará a los 80

Nintendo está en racha. Tras el lanzamiento de Pokémon Go, las zapatillas Vans temáticas y la nueva NES de pequeñas dimensiones, los seguidores de la marca con cierta eda...

item.title: RADEN Smart Luggage
item.description:
RADEN Smart Luggage

The plot might be familiar: a young start-up disrupts big, sleepy industry that nobody young wants to touch-but the ending is sweet and actually, available to purchase on the day of its launch.

item.title: Fuseproject's Three-Port Zolt Charger
item.description:
Fuseproject's Three-Port Zolt Charger

Launching today, the Zolt Laptop Charger aims to make powering all your devices faster, easier and much less cumbersome. The charger-designed by fuseproject -is a sleek, lightweight device with three USB ports. This translates to charging three devices (laptop, phone, smartwatch, portable phone-charger, you name it) all at once-while only using one power outlet.

item.title: Super stylli: our pick of the finest (and most stylish) smart-pens.
item.description:
Super stylli: our pick of the finest (and most stylish) smart-pens.

Before touchpads, the stylus was at the cutting edge of data entry. And while designers and CAD operators remain devoted to the device, the advent of the touchscreen has sparked fresh interest in stylish stylii. Silicon Valley's big players are now rolling out a new era of smart stationery.

item.title: eero: No More Internet Dead Zones
item.description:
eero: No More Internet Dead Zones

Nearly all homes have a WiFi dead zone: you never get messages in the kitchen, you can't watch Netflix in the bedroom, you can't FaceTime in the backyard. This is simply because most of us have one WiFi router for our entire home, and that just doesn't work for how we use Internet today.

item.title: Reduced Spoke Bicycles : Conceptual Bike
item.description:
Reduced Spoke Bicycles : Conceptual Bike

Conceptual Bike - Ion Lucin has simplified the design of a standard two-wheeler with his conceptual bike Baik that opts for three-spoked wheels, a limited use of lin...
